The 2021 Karnataka State Film Awards, presented by Government of Karnataka, felicitated the best of Karnataka cinema released in the year 2021–22. The selection advisory committee was headed by senior journalist, Sadashiva Shenoy.
The film 777 Charlie emerged as a biggest winner with four awards including Best Second Film, Best Actor, Best Lyrics and Best Editing.
